name: Hotel Marignan Champs-Elysées
description:
Located between Avenue George V and Avenue Montaigne, a 2-minute walk from the Champs-Elysées, Hotel Marignan is a design hotel in Paris’s 8th district. It offers luxury accommodation, a restaurant, bar and cinema room.

Rooms at Hotel Marignan are air-conditioned and designed to look like contemporary Parisian apartments with marble and oak furniture. They are equipped with a HD flat-screen satellite TV, iPod docking station and private bathroom.

Some rooms feature a private terrace with views of the Eiffel Tower, where guests can also enjoy their breakfast, lunch or dinner.

The hotel's bar also serves various cocktails, hot and cold drinks as well as a tapas menu from 18:00. The restaurant provides traditional French cuisine prepared with seasonal products for lunch and dinner.

Additional facilities and services include free WiFi, 24-hour room service and a 24-hour reception desk.

name: Hôtel Pont Royal
description:
Hotel Pont Royal offers elegant accommodation and free internet. It is located in the trendy Saint Germain des Prés area on Paris’s left bank, near art galleries and the Louvre.

Guest rooms at the Hotel Pont Royal are air-conditioned. They include a minibar, safe, flat-screen TV with satellite channels and modern en suite facilities.

A full buffet breakfast can be enjoyed every day before work or sightseeing. Atelier St Germain de Joel Robuchon, the hotel’s restaurant, is internationally acclaimed and serves gourmet cuisine.

The Pont Royal’s central location means guests can explore the city on foot or by Metro. Its rich history (it has welcomed famous artists and writers, including Albert Camus and Boris Vian) makes it the perfect place to experience this romantic city.
